description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Pork Loin With Apples In Cider recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roasted Pork Loin With Apples In Cider
name: Roasted Pork Loin With Apples In Cider Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pork from the pan and rest for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, drain the cooking juices from the pan into a jug and keep warm. Remove the string from the pork and slice. Serve with apples, onion, reserved pan juices and crispy sage leaves.
